info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5375
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.hackerone.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5375
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.hackerone.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.hackerone.com.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 -all"
www.hackerone.com.	300	IN	TXT	"70gn9hp69jzpn3nkp42r8n9jwwtd1d70"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5635
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;hackerone.com.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5635
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;hackerone.com.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
hackerone.com.	21600	IN	NS	b.ns.hackerone.com.
hackerone.com.	21600	IN	NS	a.ns.hackerone.com.

info.name: DNSSEC Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC) are enabled. The Delegation of Signing (DS) record provides information about a signed zone file when DNSSEC enabled.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 60257
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;hackerone.com.	IN	 DS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 60257
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;hackerone.com.	IN	 DS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
hackerone.com.	86400	IN	DS	2371 13 2 5BB3CF845BAE1692299CCE6623AF80AC8B8AB20434796D754FD20634C7282D87

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36637
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.hackerone.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36637
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.hackerone.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.hackerone.com.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=reject; fo=1; ri=3600; rua=mailto:fgunarop@ag.dmarcian.com,mailto:dmarc-reports@hackerone.com; ruf=mailto:fgunarop@fr.dmarcian.com;"
